profile_name.description: The name of the profile for this filament. If there is a profile specifically for this filament, that is what should be specified, even if it is printer specific. For slic3r variants, data after the '@' does not need to be included and will be removed when loading into python.

overrides.description: Key-value pairs for settings that should be overridden for this filament

generic.description: Generic options that will automatically be mapped to the correct config definition for each slicer. Slicer specific settings are applied first, then these are applied on top

material.title: Material Type
material.description: The type of material (e.g., PLA, PETG, ABS). This determines the base properties and recommended settings.

material_class.title: Material Class
material_class.description: The manufacturing process class. FFF (Fused Filament Fabrication) for standard filament printing, SLA for resin-based printing.

default_max_dry_temperature.title: Default Max Dry Temperature (°C)
default_max_dry_temperature.description: Maximum temperature (in °C) that can be used to dry this material without degradation. Common values: PLA ~45°C, PETG ~65°C, ABS ~80°C.

default_slicer_settings.title: Default Slicer Settings
default_slicer_settings.description: Configure default slicer profiles and temperature overrides for different slicing software. Toggle each slicer to configure its specific settings.
